metadata.header_path: /Amazon Launches Massive Workforce Development Program for Future Economy/
aws::graph::propositions: # Skills 2030 Workforce Development Initiative
Skills 2030 offers over 200 different certification tracks.
Certification tracks range from basic digital literacy to advanced specializations in quantum computing and biotechnology.
Each certification track includes hands-on training with industry-standard equipment.
Each certification track includes mentorship from experienced professionals.
Each certification track includes guaranteed job placement assistance upon completion.
Amazon has secured partnerships with over 10,000 employers.
Over 10,000 employers have committed to hiring Skills 2030 program graduates.
Skills 2030 uses an innovative "Learn and Earn" model.
The "Learn and Earn" model allows participants to receive paid apprenticeships while completing their training.
The "Learn and Earn" model ensures workers can support their families during the transition to new careers.
Skills 2030 provides living stipends to participants.
Skills 2030 provides childcare assistance to participants.
Skills 2030 provides transportation support to participants.
Skills 2030 removes barriers that prevent workers from accessing training opportunities.
Skills 2030 includes specialized programs for underrepresented groups.
Underrepresented groups include women in technology.
Underrepresented groups include veterans transitioning to civilian careers.
Underrepresented groups include workers in rural communities.
Skills 2030 uses mobile training units to bring education directly to underserved areas.
Skills 2030 uses virtual reality systems to provide immersive training experiences.
Virtual reality systems simulate real-world work environments.

metadata.header_path: /Amazon Launches Massive Workforce Development Program for Future Economy/
/Amazon Launches Massive Workforce Development Program for Future Economy/

text:
The program offers over 200 different certification tracks, ranging from basic digital literacy to advanced specializations in quantum computing and biotechnology. Each track includes hands-on training with industry-standard equipment, mentorship from experienced professionals, and guaranteed job placement assistance upon completion. Amazon has secured partnerships with over 10,000 employers who have committed to hiring program graduates.

Skills 2030's innovative "Learn and Earn" model allows participants to receive paid apprenticeships while completing their training, ensuring that workers can support their families during the transition to new careers. The program provides living stipends, childcare assistance, and transportation support to remove barriers that prevent workers from accessing training opportunities.

The initiative includes specialized programs for underrepresented groups, including women in technology, veterans transitioning to civilian careers, and workers in rural communities. Mobile training units bring education directly to underserved areas, while virtual reality systems provide immersive training experiences that simulate real-world work environments.
